title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\Admin\V2\ListClustersRequest
name: ListClustersRequest
description:
Request message for BigtableInstanceAdmin.ListClusters.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The unique name of the instance for which a list of clusters is requested. Values are of the form projects/{project}/instances/{instance}. Use {instance} = '-' to list Clusters for all Instances in a project, e.g., projects/myproject/instances/-.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: DEPRECATED: This field is unused and ignored.
